## GAD-7 vs TFLB

Comparing psychological questionnaires like GAD-7 and TFLB has traditionally been a time-consuming and complex process. Each instrument assesses distinct aspects of mental health and well-being, with GAD-7 focusing on anxiety symptoms and TFLB on alcohol use. The mismatch of the two questionnaires' content, focus, and format means that discerning comparable measures across the two can be challenging. Thankfully, the GAD-7 vs TFLB comparison no longer needs to be a daunting task, thanks to Harmony. Harmony is an innovative software specifically designed to harmonise questionnaire items. It uses advanced artificial intelligence and natural language processing to identify similarities among the items in different questionnaires and can even operate across languages. When considering the GAD-7 vs TFLB match-up, Harmony can provide a percentage match between the individual items in both questionnaires, adding a quantitative layer to comparison analyses that is often missing from manual reviews. Instead of manually sorting through lengthy PDFs, researchers can now simply upload their instruments through Harmony's user-friendly web interface. The softwareâ€™s database has a wide variety of instruments available for comparison, but users also have the option to upload their own instruments in a PDF format. The application of the Harmony tool in the GAD-7 vs TFLB comparison, or any other match-up, can notably streamline the complex and time-consuming process of questionnaire harmonisation. By embracing Harmony, psychologists and social scientists can facilitate their research and advance their understanding of mental health.

## Compare the items in GAD-7 English and TFLB

* <a href="https://harmonydata.ac.uk/app/#" target="harmonyapp">Import GAD-7 and TFLB into Harmony and harmonise them</a> - find similarities between the two instruments using our AI platform
* <a href="https://harmonydata.ac.uk/app/#" target="harmonyapp">Import just GAD-7 into Harmony</a> - compare GAD-7 English with other instruments
* <a href="https://harmonydata.ac.uk/app/#" target="harmonyapp">Import just TFLB into Harmony</a> - compare TFLB with other instruments


## Questions in GAD-7

|   No. | GAD-7 English                                                                                                                                      |
|------:|:---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|
|     1 | Feeling nervous, anxious, or on edge                                                                                                               |
|     2 | Not being able to stop or control worrying                                                                                                         |
|     3 | Worrying too much about different things                                                                                                           |
|     4 | Trouble relaxing                                                                                                                                   |
|     5 | Being so restless that it is hard to sit still                                                                                                     |
|     6 | Becoming easily annoyed or irritable                                                                                                               |
|     7 | Feeling afraid, as if something awful might happen                                                                                                 |
|     8 | If you checked any problems, how difficult have they made it for you to do your work, take care of things at home, or get along with other people? |
